Description: Unique numeric identifier for the effect category (e.g. 1 for Distortion, 2 for Dynamics)
Image file name used to represent the category in the UI
Abbreviated name of the category used in constrained UI spaces
Hex color code used for the category in the UI
List of subcategories containing the effects (e.g. Mono, Stereo, Legacy)
Numeric identifier for the subcategory (e.g. 4 for Mono, 5 for Stereo)
List of effect models in this subcategory
Unique identifier for the specific effect (e.g. "HD2_DistKinkyBoost")
Display name of the effect shown in the UI (e.g. "Kinky Boost")
Image file name used to represent the effect in the UI
List of parameters that can be adjusted for this effect
Reference to another subcategory's effect definition (used for shared effects)
Boolean flag to indicate if the effect should be hidden in the UI
Time interval for meter updates (used in certain effect types)
Name of the parameter as shown in the UI
Current value or default value of the parameter
